## A Short Description of the Project 
We will be analyzing New York City demographics and geography through MTA ridership data such as neighborhood accessibility. 

## 2-3 Broad Research Questions the Team is Interested in Exploring  

* What train lines are most popular?  
* How has ridership changed across time?
* Which neighborhoods are lacking access to the subway?  


## The Reasons/Inspirations Behind Choosing This Project 

The inspiration behind this project comes from our shared experience of growing up in New York City. As active participants in the New York City subway, we are looking to better understand ridership and access across the metropolitan area. Th visualize our findings to share how infrastructure and movement impact life in New York City.
